name: Animal Forest Save the Crystal
description:
Gameplay:

 Animal Forest Save the Crystal is a two-player cooperative top-down view puzzle game about the animals working together to save the crystal in the forest

Background:

In an ancient forest, there is a soul crystal that guards the forest and the animals with its power. To thank it for its kindness, the animals held the Crystal Festival every year. The annual Crystal Festival started again, and just as the animals were gathering together, a huge lightning bolt struck the crystal ....
